long_description: The GoPro Battery BacPac seamlessly attaches to the back of your GoPro to increase battery life. It's perfect for long-duration time-lapse photo sessions or any activity needing extended battery life. You can charge it using the GoPro auto or wall charger (sold separately) or from a computer via USB. LCD window on the GoPro Battery BacPac displays battery level for charging; LED light displays recording status.
short_description: The GoPro Battery BacPac seamlessly attaches to the back of your GoPro to increase battery life. It's perfect for long-duration time-lapse photo sessions or any activity needing extended battery life.
